title: I completed 10th and I am good at biology. I want to become a science teacher. What can I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: In feature if you become bio teacher don't forget to teach REPRODUCTION CHAPTER They know only doing population not about Controlling population.

From the query I inferred that you are good in biology but want to become science teacher .You are not clear about the subject but one thing is clear that your passion is teaching Take either maths with science or bio science for your higher secondary course. After +2 go for Botany or zoology as major subject in degree course and after that take B.Ed in Natural Science Or Integrated B.Ed course in biology B.Sc,Ed is offered by I.I .E formerly Regional College of Education Mysore . Pioneer institute in Education .Now few private institutes also offering such courses
